Typedef Documentation

typedef void(* RoutingHandler)(StationId destId, StationId transId, double expirationTime, int length, ERouteEntryUpdate updateAction, void *pUserArg)

Route entry handler add/update/remove handler. Is called each time a routing entry is being added, updated or removed (expired)

Parameters:
destId [in] destination station id
transId [in] transit station id
expirationTime [in] entry expiration time
updateAction [in] true if entry is being added or updated
pUserArg [in] user defined argument

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum ERouteEntryUpdate

Routing entry modifying flag.

Enumerator:
eROUTE_ADD  Entry is being added.
eROUTE_UPDATE  Entry is being modified.
eROUTE_REMOVE  Entry is being removed.

EStatus RoutingLookFor ( Routing *  pThis,
StationId  dstId,
StationId *  pTransitId 
)

Looks for a route to destination id

Parameters:
pThis [in] pointer to instance
dstId [in] destination station id
pTransitId [out] transit station id will be stored in *pTransitId
Returns:
eSTATUS_COMMON_OK if the route was found and *pTransit was filled with valid station id

eSTATUS_LIST_NOT_FOUND if the route was not found
